definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: This paper presents a way of software integration of VXI measure control system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了電熱化學炮VXI測控系統的集成技術。

sentences.english: Practical running result shows that this system performs well.
sentences.chinese: 測控儀實際運行效果良好。

sentences.english: The modeling analysis technique is one of the most important approaches in space-flight mission.
sentences.chinese: 模型化處理是飛行器測控工程的重要技術之一。

sentences.english: A comparison controlled automatic temperature-measuring and -controlling instrument isdescribed.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種比較控制式溫度自動測控儀。

sentences.english: The research achivevements and the analysis ways in tiffs paper provide scientific basis for improving accuracy in the related application.
sentences.chinese: 本研究結果爲提高超聲測控的準確性提供了依據。

sentences.english: Space-based TT&C Mode(SBTM) is necessary for TT&C of satellites.
sentences.chinese: 天基測控模式是航天器測控發展的必然趨勢。

sentences.english: Space-based TT&C Mode(SBTM) is necessary for TT&C of satellites.
sentences.chinese: 天基測控模式是航天器測控發展的必然趨勢。

sentences.english: China to have deep space monitoring network in 2016.
sentences.chinese: 我國深空測控網建設步伐加快2016年將全面建成。

sentences.english: This paper introduced a distributed measurement and control network system based on virtual instrument.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一種面向虛擬儀器的分佈式網絡測控系統。

sentences.english: It introduces a scheme about CO2 consistence controllers.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種溫室CO2濃度測控儀設計方案。

sentences.english: Satellites require the support of earth-based TT&C systems.
sentences.chinese: 衛星運行需要地面測控系統的支持。

sentences.english: The value of standard sag is an important factor to measure and control the sag of transmission line.
sentences.chinese: 標準弧垂是新建架空線路弧垂測控的重要依據之一。

sentences.english: In this paper, a design concept of multi-loop measurement and control system is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種多回路測控系統的設計方案。

sentences.english: The pseudo-random code is widely used in the communications and the telemetry and telecontrol system.
sentences.chinese: 僞隨機碼廣泛應用於通信及測控領域。

sentences.english: A balanced scheduling algorithm is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了測控網均衡調度的方法。

sentences.english: The spacer installed position can be accurately measured and controlled by angular method(theodolite method).
sentences.chinese: 利用“角度法”能準確測控間隔棒的安裝位置。
